 3880:         {get_results, From, Ref} ->
 3881:             From ! {Ref, CntMap};
 3882:         {exit, Reason} ->
 3883:             OldCnt = maps:get(Reason, CntMap, 0),
 3884:             exit_counter(CntMap#{Reason => OldCnt+1})
 3885:     end.
 3886: 
 3887: spawn_request_link_parent_exit_nodedown_test(Node) ->
 3888:     pong = net_adm:ping(Node),
 3889:     ChildFun = fun () ->
 3890:                        process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 3891:                        receive
 3892:                            {'EXIT', _, Reason} ->
 3893:                                exit_counter ! {exit, Reason}
 3894:                        end
 3895:                end,
 3896:     {Pid, Mon} = spawn_monitor(fun () ->
 3897:                                        _ReqID = spawn_request(Node,
 3898:                                                               ChildFun,
 3899:                                                               [link,
 3900:                                                                {priority,max}]),
 3901:                                        exit(bye)
 3902:                                end),
 3903:     receive
 3904:         {'DOWN', Mon, process, Pid, Reason} ->
 3905:             bye = Reason,
 3906:             erlang:disconnect_node(Node)
 3907:     end,
 3908:     ok.
 3909: 
 3910: 
 3911: spawn_request_abandon_bif(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3912:     {ok, Peer, Node} = ?CT_PEER(),
 3913:     false = spawn_request_abandon(make_ref()),
 3914:     false = spawn_request_abandon(spawn_request(fun () -> ok end)),
 3915:     false = spawn_request_abandon(rpc:call(Node, erlang, make_ref, [])),
 3916:     try
 3917:         noreturn = spawn_request_abandon(self()) 
 3918:     catch
 3919:         error:badarg ->
 3920:             ok
 3921:     end,
 3922:     try
 3923:         noreturn = spawn_request_abandon(4711)
 3924:     catch
 3925:         error:badarg ->
 3926:             ok
 3927:     end,
 3928: 
 3929:     verify_nc(node()),
 3930: 
 3931:     %% Ensure code loaded on other node...
 3932:     _ = rpc:call(Node, ?MODULE, module_info, []),
 3933: 
 3934: 
 3935:     TotOps = 1000,
 3936:     Tester = self(),
 3937: 
 3938:     ParentFun = fun (Wait, Opts) ->
 3939:                         ReqId = spawn_request(Node, ?MODULE,
 3940:                                               spawn_request_test_exit_child,
 3941:                                               [Tester], Opts),
 3942:                         receive after Wait -> ok end,
 3943:                         case spawn_request_abandon(ReqId) of
 3944:                             true ->
 3945:                                 ok;
 3946:                             false ->
 3947:                                 receive
 3948:                                     {spawn_reply, ReqId, error, _} ->
 3949:                                         exit(spawn_failed);
 3950:                                     {spawn_reply, ReqId, ok, Pid} ->
 3951:                                         unlink(Pid),
 3952:                                         exit(Pid, bye)
 3953:                                 after
 3954:                                     0 ->
 3955:                                         exit(missing_spawn_reply)
 3956:                                 end
 3957:                         end
 3958:                 end,
 3959:     %% Parent exit early...
 3960:     lists:foreach(fun (N) ->
 3961:                           spawn_opt(fun () ->
 3962:                                             ParentFun(N rem 50, [link])
 3963:                                     end, [link,{priority,max}])
 3964:                   end,
 3965:                   lists:seq(1, TotOps)),
 3966:     NoA1 = gather_parent_exits(abandoned, true),
 3967:     %% Parent exit late...
 3968:     lists:foreach(fun (N) ->
 3969:                           spawn_opt(fun () ->
 3970:                                             ParentFun(N rem 50, [link]),
 3971:                                             receive
 3972:                                                 {spawn_reply, _, _, _} ->
 3973:                                                     exit(unexpected_spawn_reply)
 3974:                                             after
 3975:                                                 1000 -> ok
 3976:                                             end
 3977:                                     end, [link,{priority,max}])
 3978:                   end,
 3979:                   lists:seq(1, TotOps)),
 3980:     NoA2 = gather_parent_exits(abandoned, true),
 3981:     CFs = erpc:call(Node,
 3982:                     fun () ->
 3983:                             %% Ensure all children have had time to enter an exiting state...
 3984:                             receive after 100*test_server:timetrap_scale_factor() -> ok end,
 3985:                             lists:map(fun (P) ->
 3986:                                               {P, process_info(P, current_function)}
 3987:                                       end, processes())
 3988:                     end),
 3989:     lists:foreach(fun ({P, {current_function, {?MODULE, spawn_request_test_exit_child, 1}}}) ->
 3990:                           ct:fail({missing_exit_to_child_detected, P});
 3991:                       (_) ->
 3992:                           ok
 3993:                   end, CFs),
 3994:     %% Parent exit early...
 3995:     lists:foreach(fun (N) ->
 3996:                           spawn_opt(fun () ->
 3997:                                             ParentFun(N rem 50, [])
 3998:                                     end, [link,{priority,max}])
 3999:                   end,
 4000:                   lists:seq(1, TotOps)),
 4001:     0 = gather_parent_exits(abandoned, true),
 4002:     %% Parent exit late...
 4003:     lists:foreach(fun (N) ->
 4004:                           spawn_opt(fun () ->
 4005:                                             ParentFun(N rem 50, []),
 4006:                                             receive
 4007:                                                 {spawn_reply, _, _, _} ->
 4008:                                                     exit(unexpected_spawn_reply)
 4009:                                             after
 4010:                                                 1000 -> ok
 4011:                                             end
 4012:                                     end, [link,{priority,max}])
 4013:                   end,
 4014:                   lists:seq(1, TotOps)),
 4015:     0 = gather_parent_exits(abandoned, true),
 4016:     stop_node(Peer, Node),
 4017:     C = "Got " ++ integer_to_list(NoA1) ++ " and "
 4018:         ++ integer_to_list(NoA2) ++ " abandoneds of 2*"
 4019:         ++ integer_to_list(TotOps) ++ " ops!",
 4020:     true = NoA1 /= 0,
 4021:     true = NoA1 /= TotOps,
 4022:     true = NoA2 /= 0,
 4023:     true = NoA2 /= TotOps,
 4024:     {comment, C}.
 4025: 
 4026: spawn_request_test_exit_child(Tester) ->
 4027:   Child = self(),
 4028:   _ = spawn_opt(fun () ->
 4029:                         process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 4030:                         receive
 4031:                             {'EXIT', Child, Reason} ->
 4032:                                 Tester ! {parent_exit, Reason}
 4033:                         end
 4034:                 end, [link,{priority,max}]),
 4035:   receive after infinity -> ok end.
 4036: 
 4037: gather_parent_exits(Reason, AllowOther) ->
 4038:     receive after 2000 -> ok end,
 4039:     gather_parent_exits(Reason, AllowOther, 0).
 4040: 
 4041: gather_parent_exits(Reason, AllowOther, N) ->
 4042:     receive
 4043:         {parent_exit, Reason} ->
 4044:             gather_parent_exits(Reason, AllowOther, N+1);
 4045:         {parent_exit, _} = ParentExit ->
 4046:             case AllowOther of
 4047:                 false ->
 4048:                     ct:fail(ParentExit);
 4049:                 true ->
 4050:                     gather_parent_exits(Reason, AllowOther, N)
 4051:             end
 4052:     after 0 ->
 4053:             N
 4054:     end.
 4055: dist_spawn_monitor(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 4056:     {ok, Peer, Node} = ?CT_PEER(),
 4057:     R1 = spawn_request(Node, erlang, exit, [hej], [monitor]),
 4058:     receive
 4059:         {spawn_reply, R1, ok, P1} ->
 4060:             receive
 4061:                 {'DOWN', R1, process, P1, Reason1} ->
 4062:                     hej = Reason1
 4063:             end
 4064:     end,
 4065:     {P2, Mon2} = spawn_monitor(Node, erlang, exit, [hej]),
 4066:     receive
 4067:         {'DOWN', Mon2, process, P2, Reason2} ->
 4068:             hej = Reason2
 4069:     end,
 4070:     {P3, Mon3} = spawn_opt(Node, erlang, exit, [hej], [monitor]),
 4071:     receive
 4072:         {'DOWN', Mon3, process, P3, Reason3} ->
 4073:             hej = Reason3
 4074:     end,
 4075:     stop_node(Peer, Node),
 4076:     ok.
 4077: 
 4078: spawn_against_ei_node(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 4079:     %% Spawn against an ei node which does not support spawn
 4080:     {ok, EiNode} = start_ei_node(Config),
 4081:     try
 4082:         %% First spawn triggering a new connection; which
 4083:         %% will trigger hopeful data transcoding
 4084:         %% of spawn requests...
 4085:         io:format("~n~nDoing initial connect tests...~n", []),
 4086:         spawn_ei_node_test(EiNode, true),
 4087:         %% Spawns on an already existing connection...
 4088:         io:format("~n~nDoing already connected tests...~n", []),
 4089:         spawn_ei_node_test(EiNode, false),
 4090:         ok
 4091:     after
 4092:         ok = stop_ei_node(EiNode)
 4093:     end.
 4094: 
 4095: spawn_against_old_node(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 4096:     %% Same spawn tests against a two releases old node as against
 4097:     %% ei node above
 4098:     OldRel = integer_to_list(list_to_integer(erlang:system_info(otp_release))-2),
 4099:     OldRelName = OldRel ++ "_latest",
 4100:     %% We clear all ERL_FLAGS for the old node as all options may not
 4101:     %% be supported.
 4102:     ClearEnv = lists:foldl(
 4103:                  fun({Key,_Value}, Acc) ->
 4104:                          case re:run(Key,"^ERL_.*FLAGS$") of
 4105:                              {match,_} ->
 4106:                                  [{Key,""}|Acc];
 4107:                              nomatch ->
 4108:                                  Acc
 4109:                          end
 4110:                  end, [], os:env()),
 4111:     case ?CT_PEER_REL(#{connection => 0, env => ClearEnv },
 4112:                       OldRelName,
 4113:                       proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config)) of
 4114: 	not_available ->
 4115:             {skipped, "No OTP "++OldRel++" available"};
 4116:         {ok, Peer, OldNode} ->
 4117:             try
 4118:                 %% Spawns triggering a new connection; which
 4119:                 %% will trigger hopeful data transcoding
 4120:                 %% of spawn requests...
 4121:                 io:format("~n~nDoing initial connect tests...~n", []),
 4122:                 spawn_node_test(OldNode, true),
 4123:                 io:format("~n~nDoing already connected tests...~n", []),
 4124:                 %% Spawns on an already existing connection...
 4125:                 spawn_node_test(OldNode, false),
 4126:                 ok
 4127:             after
 4128:                 peer:stop(Peer)
 4129:             end
 4130:     end.
 4131: 
 4132: spawn_against_new_node(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 4133:     {ok, Peer, CurrNode} = ?CT_PEER(#{connection => 0}),
 4134:     try
 4135:         %% Spawns triggering a new connection; which
 4136:         %% will trigger hopeful data transcoding
 4137:         %% of spawn requests...
 4138:         io:format("~n~nDoing initial connect tests...~n", []),
 4139:         spawn_node_test(CurrNode, true),
 4140:         io:format("~n~nDoing already connected tests...~n", []),
 4141:         %% Spawns on an already existing connection...
 4142:         spawn_node_test(CurrNode, false),
 4143:         ok
 4144:     after
 4145:         peer:stop(Peer)
 4146:     end.
 4147: 
 4148: spawn_ei_node_test(Node, Disconnect) ->
 4149:     io:format("Testing spawn_request() against ei node...", []),
 4150:     disconnect_node(Node, Disconnect),
 4151:     Ref1 = spawn_request(Node, erlang, exit, [hej], [monitor, {reply_tag, a_tag}]),
 4152:     receive
 4153:         {a_tag, Ref1, Err, Notsup} ->
 4154:             error = Err,
 4155:             notsup = Notsup,
 4156:             ok
 4157:     end,
 4158:     io:format("Testing spawn_monitor() against ei node...", []),
 4159:     disconnect_node(Node, Disconnect),
 4160:     try
 4161:         spawn_monitor(Node, erlang, exit, [hej])
 4162:     catch
 4163:         error:notsup ->
 4164:             ok
 4165:     end,
 4166:     io:format("Testing spawn_opt() with monitor against ei node...", []),
 4167:     disconnect_node(Node, Disconnect),
 4168:     {P0, M0} = spawn_opt(Node, erlang, exit, [hej], [monitor]),
 4169:     receive
 4170:         {'DOWN', M0, process, P0, R0} ->
 4171:             notsup = R0
 4172:     end,
 4173:     io:format("Testing spawn_opt() with link against ei node...", []),
 4174:     disconnect_node(Node, Disconnect),
 4175:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 4176:     P1 = spawn_opt(Node, erlang, exit, [hej], [link]),
 4177:     receive
 4178:         {'EXIT', P1, R1} ->
 4179:             notsup = R1
 4180:     end,
 4181:     io:format("Testing spawn_link() against ei node...", []),
 4182:     disconnect_node(Node, Disconnect),
 4183:     P2 = spawn_link(Node, erlang, exit, [hej]),
 4184:     receive
 4185:         {'EXIT', P2, R2} ->
 4186:             notsup = R2
 4187:     end,
 4188:     ok.
 4189: 
 4190: disconnect_node(_Node, false) ->
 4191:     ok;
 4192: disconnect_node(Node, true) ->
 4193:     lists:member(Node, nodes([visible, hidden])) andalso begin
 4194:         monitor_node(Node, true),
 4195:         true = erlang:disconnect_node(Node),
 4196:         receive {nodedown, Node} -> ok end
 4197:     end.
 4198: 
 4199: spawn_node_test(Node, Disconnect) ->
 4200:     io:format("Testing spawn_request()...", []),
 4201:     disconnect_node(Node, Disconnect),
 4202:     R1 = spawn_request(Node, erlang, exit, [hej], [monitor, {reply_tag, a_tag}]),
 4203:     receive
 4204:         {a_tag, R1, ok, P1} ->
 4205:             Node = node(P1),
 4206:             receive
 4207:                 {'DOWN', R1, process, P1, hej} -> ok
 4208:             end
 4209:     end,
 4210:     io:format("Testing spawn_monitor()...", []),
 4211:     disconnect_node(Node, Disconnect),
 4212:     {P2, M2} = spawn_monitor(Node, erlang, exit, [hej]),
 4213:     receive
 4214:         {'DOWN', M2, process, P2, hej} -> ok
 4215:     end,
 4216:     Node = node(P2),
 4217:     io:format("Testing spawn_opt() with monitor...", []),
 4218:     disconnect_node(Node, Disconnect),
 4219:     {P3, M3} = spawn_opt(Node, erlang, exit, [hej], [monitor]),
 4220:     receive
 4221:         {'DOWN', M3, process, P3, hej} -> ok
 4222:     end,
 4223:     Node = node(P3),
 4224:     io:format("Testing spawn_opt() with link...", []),
 4225:     disconnect_node(Node, Disconnect),
 4226:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 4227:     P4 = spawn_opt(Node, erlang, exit, [hej], [link]),
 4228:     Node = node(P4),
 4229:     receive
 4230:         {'EXIT', P4, hej} ->
 4231:             ok
 4232:     end,
 4233:     io:format("Testing spawn_link()...", []),
 4234:     disconnect_node(Node, Disconnect),
 4235:     P5 = spawn_link(Node, erlang, exit, [hej]),
 4236:     Node = node(P5),
 4237:     receive
 4238:         {'EXIT', P5, hej} ->
 4239:             ok
 4240:     end.
 4241: 
 4242: spawn_request_reply_option(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 4243:     spawn_request_reply_option_test(undefined, node()),
 4244:     {ok, Peer, Node} = ?CT_PEER(),
 4245:     spawn_request_reply_option_test(Peer, Node).
 4246:     
 4247: spawn_request_reply_option_test(Peer, Node) ->
 4248:     io:format("Testing on node: ~p~n", [Node]),
 4249:     Parent = self(),
 4250:     Done1 = make_ref(),
 4251:     RID1 = spawn_request(Node, fun () -> Parent ! Done1 end, [{reply, yes}]),
 4252:     receive Done1 -> ok end,
 4253:     receive
 4254:         {spawn_reply, RID1, ok, _} -> ok
 4255:     after 0 ->
 4256:             ct:fail(missing_spawn_reply)
 4257:     end,
 4258:     Done2 = make_ref(),
 4259:     RID2 = spawn_request(Node, fun () -> Parent ! Done2 end, [{reply, success_only}]),
 4260:     receive Done2 -> ok end,
 4261:     receive
 4262:         {spawn_reply, RID2, ok, _} -> ok
 4263:     after 0 ->
 4264:             ct:fail(missing_spawn_reply)
 4265:     end,
 4266:     Done3 = make_ref(),
 4267:     RID3 = spawn_request(Node, fun () -> Parent ! Done3 end, [{reply, error_only}]),
 4268:     receive Done3 -> ok end,
 4269:     receive
 4270:         {spawn_reply, RID3, _, _} ->
 4271:             ct:fail(unexpected_spawn_reply)
 4272:     after 0 ->
 4273:             ok
 4274:     end,
 4275:     Done4 = make_ref(),
 4276:     RID4 = spawn_request(Node, fun () -> Parent ! Done4 end, [{reply, no}]),
 4277:     receive Done4 -> ok end,
 4278:     receive
 4279:         {spawn_reply, RID4, _, _} ->
 4280:             ct:fail(unexpected_spawn_reply)
 4281:     after 0 ->
 4282:             ok
 4283:     end,
 4284:     RID5 = spawn_request(Node, fun () -> ok end, [{reply, yes}, bad_option]),
 4285:     receive
 4286:         {spawn_reply, RID5, error, badopt} -> ok
 4287:     end,
 4288:     RID6 = spawn_request(Node, fun () -> ok end, [{reply, success_only}, bad_option]),
 4289:     receive
 4290:         {spawn_reply, RID6, error, badopt} -> ct:fail(unexpected_spawn_reply)
 4291:     after 1000 -> ok
 4292:     end,
 4293:     RID7 = spawn_request(Node, fun () -> ok end, [{reply, error_only}, bad_option]),
 4294:     receive
 4295:         {spawn_reply, RID7, error, badopt} -> ok
 4296:     end,
 4297:     RID8 = spawn_request(Node, fun () -> ok end, [{reply, no}, bad_option]),
 4298:     receive
 4299:         {spawn_reply, RID8, error, badopt} -> ct:fail(unexpected_spawn_reply)
 4300:     after 1000 -> ok
 4301:     end,
 4302:     RID8_1 = spawn_request(Node, fun () -> ok end, [{reply, nahh}]),
 4303:     receive
 4304:         {spawn_reply, RID8_1, error, badopt} -> ok
 4305:     end,
 4306:     case Node == node() of
 4307:         true ->
 4308:             ok;
 4309:         false ->
 4310:             stop_node(Peer, Node),
 4311:             RID9 = spawn_request(Node, fun () -> ok end, [{reply, yes}]),
 4312:             receive
 4313:                 {spawn_reply, RID9, error, noconnection} -> ok
 4314:             end,
 4315:             RID10 = spawn_request(Node, fun () -> ok end, [{reply, success_only}]),
 4316:             receive
 4317:                 {spawn_reply, RID10, error, noconnection} -> ct:fail(unexpected_spawn_reply)
 4318:             after 1000 -> ok
 4319:             end,
 4320:             RID11 = spawn_request(Node, fun () -> ok end, [{reply, error_only}]),
 4321:             receive
 4322:                 {spawn_reply, RID11, error, noconnection} -> ok
 4323:             end,
 4324:             RID12 = spawn_request(Node, fun () -> ok end, [{reply, no}]),
 4325:             receive
 4326:                 {spawn_reply, RID12, error, noconnection} -> ct:fail(unexpected_spawn_reply)
 4327:             after 1000 -> ok
 4328:             end,
 4329:             ok
 4330:     end.
 4331: 
 4332: dist_spawn_arg_list_mixup(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 4333:     %% A process newly spawned via the distribution is passed the
 4334:     %% argument list to use as the first message followed by an intialization
 4335:     %% message. Those two messages *must* be the first messages in its queue
 4336:     %% when it begins execution. The parallel receive/send signal optimization
 4337:     %% could potentially cause reordering of messages if certain future
 4338:     %% changes are made. This test case tries to cause a situation where a
 4339:     %% message reordering potentially could happen, and hopefully will detect
 4340:     %% such problematic changes.
 4341:     Tester = self(),
 4342:     NoScheds = 8,
 4343:     NoSchedsStr = integer_to_list(NoScheds),
 4344:     NoSchedsList = lists:seq(1, NoScheds),
 4345:     {ok, Peer, Node} = ?CT_PEER(["+S"++NoSchedsStr++":"++NoSchedsStr]),
 4346:     AttackMsg = make_ref(),
 4347:     AttackArgList = [Tester, AttackMsg],
 4348:     OkMsg = make_ref(),
 4349:     As = lists:map(
 4350:            fun (_) ->
 4351:                    spawn_opt(
 4352:                      Node,
 4353:                      fun () ->
 4354:                              dist_spawn_arg_list_mixup_sender(AttackArgList,
 4355:                                                               1000)
 4356:                      end, [{priority, high}, link])
 4357:            end, NoSchedsList),
 4358:     Relay = spawn_opt(
 4359:               Node,
 4360:               fun () ->
 4361:                       receive
 4362:                           {attack, Victim} ->
 4363:                               lists:foreach(fun (A) ->
 4364:                                                     A ! {attack, Victim}
 4365:                                             end, As)
 4366:                       end
 4367:               end, [{priority, max}, link]),
 4368:     receive after 100 -> ok end,
 4369:     Victim = spawn_opt(Node, erlang, send, [Tester, OkMsg],
 4370:                        [{message_queue_data, off_heap},
 4371:                         {priority, normal},
 4372:                         link]),
 4373:     Relay ! {attack, Victim},
 4374:     receive
 4375:         OkMsg ->
 4376:             ok;
 4377:         AttackMsg ->
 4378:             ct:fail(child_process_used_message_as_argument_list)
 4379:     end,
 4380:     lists:foreach(fun (P) ->
 4381:                           unlink(P)
 4382:                   end, [Victim] ++ [Relay] ++ As),
 4383:     peer:stop(Peer),
 4384:     ok.
 4385: 
 4386: dist_spawn_arg_list_mixup_sender(Msg, N) ->
 4387:     receive
 4388:         {attack, Victim} ->
 4389:             dist_spawn_arg_list_mixup_sender(Victim, Msg, N)
 4390:     after
 4391:         0 ->
 4392:             dist_spawn_arg_list_mixup_sender(Msg, N)
 4393:     end.
 4394: 
 4395: dist_spawn_arg_list_mixup_sender(_Pid, _Msg, 0) ->
 4396:     ok;
 4397: dist_spawn_arg_list_mixup_sender(Pid, Msg, N) ->
 4398:     Pid ! Msg,
 4399:     dist_spawn_arg_list_mixup_sender(Pid, Msg, N-1).
 4400: 
 4401: processes_term_proc_list(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 4402:     Tester = self(),
 4403: 
 4404:     Run = fun(Args) ->
 4405:               {ok, Peer, Node} = ?CT_PEER(Args),
 4406:               RT = spawn_link(Node, fun () ->
 4407:                               receive after 1000 -> ok end,
 4408:                               as_expected = processes_term_proc_list_test(false),
 4409:                               Tester ! {it_worked, self()}
 4410:                       end),
 4411:               receive {it_worked, RT} -> ok end,
 4412:               stop_node(Peer, Node)
 4413:           end,
 4414: 
 4415:     %% We have to run this test case with +S1 since instrument:allocations()
 4416:     %% will report a free()'d block as present until it's actually deallocated
 4417:     %% by its employer.
 4418:     Run(["+MSe", "true", "+Muatags", "false", "+S1"]),
 4419:     Run(["+MSe", "true", "+Muatags", "true", "+S1"]),
 4420: 
 4421:     ok.
 4422: 
 4423: processes_iter(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 4424:     ProcessLimit = erlang:system_info(process_limit),
 4425:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = catch erts_internal:processes_next(ProcessLimit + 1),
 4426:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = catch erts_internal:processes_next(-1),
 4427:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = catch erts_internal:processes_next(1 bsl 32),
 4428:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = catch erts_internal:processes_next(1 bsl 64),
 4429:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = catch erts_internal:processes_next(abc),
 4430: 
 4431:     none = erts_internal:processes_next(ProcessLimit),
 4432: 
 4433:     ok.
 4434: 
 4435: 
 4436: %% OTP-18322: Send msg to spawning process pid returned from processes/0
 4437: processes_send_infant(_Config) ->
 4438:     case erlang:system_info(schedulers_online) of
 4439:         1 ->
 4440:             {skip, "Only one scheduler online"};
 4441:         NScheds ->
 4442:             processes_send_infant_do(NScheds)
 4443:     end.
 4444: 
 4445: processes_send_infant_do(NScheds) ->
 4446:     IgnoreList = erlang:processes(),
 4447:     IgnorePids = maps:from_keys(IgnoreList, ignore),
 4448:     Tester = self(),
 4449: 
 4450:     %% To provoke bug we need sender and spawner on different schedulers.
 4451:     %% Let spawners use schedulers nr 2 to NScheds
 4452:     NSpawnerScheds = NScheds - 1,
 4453:     NSpawners = 2 * NSpawnerScheds,
 4454:     [spawn_link(fun() ->
 4455:                         processes_send_infant_spawner((I rem  NSpawnerScheds) + 2,
 4456:                                                       Tester, Tester, 1)
 4457:                 end)
 4458:      || I <- lists:seq(0, NSpawners-1)],
 4459: 
 4460:     %% and make sure sender use scheduler 1
 4461:     {Sender,SenderMon} =
 4462:         spawn_opt(
 4463:           fun() ->
 4464:                   timeout = processes_send_infant_loop(IgnorePids)
 4465:           end,
 4466:           [link, monitor, {scheduler,1}]),
 4467: 
 4468:     %% Run test for a little while and see if VM crashes
 4469:     {ok, _TRef} = timer:send_after(1000, Sender, timeout),
 4470:     {'DOWN', SenderMon, process, Sender, normal} = receive_any(),
 4471: 
 4472:     %% Stop spawners and collect stats
 4473:     processes_send_infant_broadcast(erlang:processes(),
 4474:                                     {processes_send_infant, stop},
 4475:                                     IgnorePids),
 4476:     {TotSpawn, TheLastOfUs} =
 4477:         lists:foldl(fun(_, {SpawnCnt, Pids}) ->
 4478:                             {Pid, Generation} = receive_any(),
 4479:                             io:format("Got ~p from ~p\n", [Generation, Pid]),
 4480:                             {SpawnCnt+Generation, [Pid | Pids]}
 4481:                     end,
 4482:                     {0, []},
 4483:                     lists:seq(1, NSpawners)),
 4484:     io:format("Total spawned processes: ~p\n", [TotSpawn]),
 4485:     Aliens = (erlang:processes() -- IgnoreList) -- TheLastOfUs,
 4486:     io:format("Alien processes: ~p\n", [Aliens]),
 4487:     ok.
 4488: 
 4489: 
 4490: 
 4491: processes_send_infant_loop(IgnorePids) ->
 4492:     %% Send message identifying this test case, in case we send
 4493:     %% to alien processes spawned during the test.
 4494:     Msg = processes_send_infant,
 4495:     processes_send_infant_broadcast(erlang:processes(),
 4496:                                     Msg,
 4497:                                     IgnorePids),
 4498:     receive timeout -> timeout
 4499:     after 0 ->
 4500:             processes_send_infant_loop(IgnorePids)
 4501:     end.
 4502: 
 4503: processes_send_infant_broadcast([Pid | Tail], Msg, IgnorePids) ->
 4504:     case maps:is_key(Pid, IgnorePids) of
 4505:         false ->
 4506:             Pid ! Msg;
 4507:         true ->
 4508:             ignore
 4509:     end,
 4510:     processes_send_infant_broadcast(Tail, Msg, IgnorePids);
 4511: processes_send_infant_broadcast([], _, _) ->
 4512:     ok.
 4513: 
 4514: processes_send_infant_spawner(Sched, Tester, Parent, Generation) ->
 4515:     link(Tester),
 4516:     case receive_any() of
 4517:         processes_send_infant ->
 4518:             case Parent of
 4519:                 Tester -> ok;
 4520:                 _ -> Parent ! {die, self()}
 4521:             end,
 4522:             Self = self(),
 4523:             Child = spawn_opt(fun() ->
 4524:                                       processes_send_infant_spawner(Sched, Tester,
 4525:                                                                     Self,
 4526:                                                                     Generation+1)
 4527:                               end,
 4528:                              [{message_queue_data, off_heap},
 4529:                               {scheduler, Sched}]),
 4530:             process_send_infant_spawner_epilogue(Child);
 4531: 
 4532:         {processes_send_infant, stop} ->
 4533:             Tester ! {self(), Generation}
 4534:     end.
 4535: 
 4536: process_send_infant_spawner_epilogue(Child) ->
 4537:     %% Parent stays alive only to ensure child gets stop message
 4538:     case receive_any() of
 4539:         processes_send_infant ->
 4540:             process_send_infant_spawner_epilogue(Child);
 4541:         {die, Child} ->
 4542:             ok;
 4543:         {processes_send_infant, stop}=Stop ->
 4544:             %% We are not sure child was spawned when stop message was sent
 4545:             %% so we relay it.
 4546:             Child ! Stop
 4547:     end.
 4548: 
 4549: 
 4550: -define(CHK_TERM_PROC_LIST(MC, XB),
 4551: 	chk_term_proc_list(?LINE, MC, XB)).
 4552: 
 4553: chk_term_proc_list(Line, MustChk, ExpectBlks) ->
 4554:     Allocs = instrument:allocations(),
 4555:     case {MustChk, Allocs} of
 4556: 	{false, {error, not_enabled}} ->
 4557: 	    not_enabled;
 4558: 	{false, {ok, {_Shift, _Unscanned, ByOrigin}}} when ByOrigin =:= #{} ->
 4559: 	    not_enabled;
 4560: 	{_, {ok, {_Shift, _Unscanned, ByOrigin}}} ->
 4561:             ByType = maps:get(system, ByOrigin, #{}),
 4562:             Hist = maps:get(ptab_list_deleted_el, ByType, {}),
 4563: 	    case lists:sum(tuple_to_list(Hist)) of
 4564: 		ExpectBlks ->
 4565:                     ok;
 4566: 		Blks ->
 4567:                     exit({line, Line, mismatch,
 4568:                           expected, ExpectBlks,
 4569:                           actual, Blks})
 4570: 	    end
 4571:     end,
 4572:     ok.
 4573: 
 4574: processes_term_proc_list_test(MustChk) ->
 4575:     Tester = self(),
 4576:     enable_internal_state(),
 4577:     PBInfo = erts_debug:get_internal_state(processes_bif_info),
 4578:     print_processes_bif_info(PBInfo),
 4579:     WantReds = PBInfo#ptab_list_bif_info.min_start_reds + 10,
 4580:     #ptab_list_bif_info{tab_chunks = Chunks,
 4581: 	tab_chunks_size = ChunksSize,
 4582: 	tab_indices_per_red = IndiciesPerRed
 4583:     } = PBInfo,
 4584:     true = Chunks > 1,
 4585:     true = Chunks*ChunksSize >= IndiciesPerRed*WantReds,
 4586:     Processes = fun () ->
 4587: 	    erts_debug:set_internal_state(reds_left,
 4588: 		WantReds),
 4589: 	    processes()
 4590:     end,
 4591:     Exit = fun (P) ->
 4592: 	    unlink(P),
 4593: 	    exit(P, bang),
 4594: 	    wait_until(
 4595: 		fun () ->
 4596: 			not lists:member(
 4597: 			    P,
 4598: 			    erts_debug:get_internal_state(
 4599: 				processes))
 4600: 		end)
 4601:     end,
 4602:     SpawnSuspendProcessesProc = fun () ->
 4603: 		  erlang:system_flag(multi_scheduling, block_normal),
 4604: 		  P = spawn_link(fun () ->
 4605: 					 Tester ! {suspend_me, self()},
 4606: 					 Tester ! {self(),
 4607: 						   done,
 4608: 						   hd(Processes())},
 4609: 					 receive after infinity -> ok end
 4610: 				 end),
 4611: 		  receive {suspend_me, P} -> ok end,
 4612: 		  erlang:suspend_process(P),
 4613: 		  erlang:system_flag(multi_scheduling, unblock_normal),
 4614: 		  [{status,suspended},
 4615: 		   {current_function,{erlang,ptab_list_continue,2}}]
 4616: 		      = process_info(P, [status, current_function]),
 4617: 		  P
 4618: 	  end,
 4619:     ResumeProcessesProc = fun (P) ->
 4620: 					erlang:resume_process(P),
 4621: 					receive {P, done, _} -> ok end
 4622: 				end,
 4623:     ?CHK_TERM_PROC_LIST(MustChk, 0),
 4624:     HangAround = fun () -> receive after infinity -> ok end end,
 4625:     HA1 = spawn_link(HangAround),
 4626:     HA2 = spawn_link(HangAround),
 4627:     HA3 = spawn_link(HangAround),
 4628:     S1 = SpawnSuspendProcessesProc(),
 4629:     ?CHK_TERM_PROC_LIST(MustChk, 1),
 4630:     Exit(HA1),
 4631:     ?CHK_TERM_PROC_LIST(MustChk, 2),
 4632:     S2 = SpawnSuspendProcessesProc(),
 4633:     ?CHK_TERM_PROC_LIST(MustChk, 3),
 4634:     S3 = SpawnSuspendProcessesProc(),
 4635:     ?CHK_TERM_PROC_LIST(MustChk, 4),
 4636:     Exit(HA2),
 4637:     ?CHK_TERM_PROC_LIST(MustChk, 5),
 4638:     S4 = SpawnSuspendProcessesProc(),
 4639:     ?CHK_TERM_PROC_LIST(MustChk, 6),
 4640:     Exit(HA3),
 4641:     ?CHK_TERM_PROC_LIST(MustChk, 7),
 4642:     ResumeProcessesProc(S1),
 4643:     ?CHK_TERM_PROC_LIST(MustChk, 5),
 4644:     ResumeProcessesProc(S3),
 4645:     ?CHK_TERM_PROC_LIST(MustChk, 4),
 4646:     ResumeProcessesProc(S4),
 4647:     ?CHK_TERM_PROC_LIST(MustChk, 3),
 4648:     ResumeProcessesProc(S2),
 4649:     ?CHK_TERM_PROC_LIST(MustChk, 0),
 4650:     Exit(S1),
 4651:     Exit(S2),
 4652:     Exit(S3),
 4653:     Exit(S4),
 4654: 
 4655: 
 4656:     HA4 = spawn_link(HangAround),
 4657:     HA5 = spawn_link(HangAround),
 4658:     HA6 = spawn_link(HangAround),
 4659:     S5 = SpawnSuspendProcessesProc(),
 4660:     ?CHK_TERM_PROC_LIST(MustChk, 1),
 4661:     Exit(HA4),
 4662:     ?CHK_TERM_PROC_LIST(MustChk, 2),
 4663:     S6 = SpawnSuspendProcessesProc(),
 4664:     ?CHK_TERM_PROC_LIST(MustChk, 3),
 4665:     Exit(HA5),
 4666:     ?CHK_TERM_PROC_LIST(MustChk, 4),
 4667:     S7 = SpawnSuspendProcessesProc(),
 4668:     ?CHK_TERM_PROC_LIST(MustChk, 5),
 4669:     Exit(HA6),
 4670:     ?CHK_TERM_PROC_LIST(MustChk, 6),
 4671:     S8 = SpawnSuspendProcessesProc(),
 4672:     ?CHK_TERM_PROC_LIST(MustChk, 7),
 4673: 
 4674:     erlang:system_flag(multi_scheduling, block_normal),
 4675:     Exit(S8),
 4676:     ?CHK_TERM_PROC_LIST(MustChk, 7),
 4677:     Exit(S5),
 4678:     ?CHK_TERM_PROC_LIST(MustChk, 6),
 4679:     Exit(S7),
 4680:     ?CHK_TERM_PROC_LIST(MustChk, 6),
 4681:     Exit(S6),
 4682:     ?CHK_TERM_PROC_LIST(MustChk, 0),
 4683:     erlang:system_flag(multi_scheduling, unblock_normal),
 4684:     as_expected.
 4685: 
 4686: 
 4687: otp_7738_waiting(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 4688:     otp_7738_test(waiting).
 4689: 
 4690: otp_7738_suspended(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 4691:     otp_7738_test(suspended).
 4692: 
 4693: otp_7738_resume(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 4694:     otp_7738_test(resume).
 4695: 
 4696: otp_7738_test(Type) ->
 4697:     sys_mem_cond_run(3072, fun () -> do_otp_7738_test(Type) end).
 4698: 
 4699: do_otp_7738_test(Type) ->
 4700:     T = self(),
 4701:     S = spawn_link(fun () ->
 4702: 		receive
 4703: 		    {suspend, Suspendee} ->
 4704: 			erlang:suspend_process(Suspendee),
 4705: 			T ! {suspended, Suspendee},
 4706: 			receive
 4707: 			after 10 ->
 4708: 				erlang:resume_process(Suspendee),
 4709: 				Suspendee ! wake_up
 4710: 			end;
 4711: 		    {send, To, Msg} ->
 4712: 			receive after 10 -> ok end,
 4713: 			To ! Msg
 4714: 		end
 4715: 	end),
 4716:     R = spawn_link(fun () ->
 4717: 		X = lists:seq(1, 20000000),
 4718: 		T ! {initialized, self()},
 4719: 		case Type of
 4720: 		    _ when Type == suspended;
 4721: 		Type == waiting ->
 4722: 		    receive _ -> ok end;
 4723: 		_ when Type == resume ->
 4724: 		    Receive = fun (F) ->
 4725: 			    receive
 4726: 				_ ->
 4727: 				    ok
 4728: 			    after 0 ->
 4729: 				    F(F)
 4730: 			    end
 4731: 		    end,
 4732: 		    Receive(Receive)
 4733: 	    end,
 4734: 	    T ! {woke_up, self()},
 4735: 	    id(X)
 4736:     end),
 4737:     receive {initialized, R} -> ok end,
 4738:     receive after 10 -> ok end,
 4739:     case Type of
 4740: 	      suspended ->
 4741: 		  erlang:suspend_process(R),
 4742: 		  S ! {send, R, wake_up};
 4743: 	      waiting ->
 4744: 		  S ! {send, R, wake_up};
 4745: 	      resume ->
 4746: 		  S ! {suspend, R},
 4747: 		  receive {suspended, R} -> ok end
 4748: 	  end,
 4749:     erlang:garbage_collect(R),
 4750:     case Type of
 4751: 	      suspended ->
 4752: 		  erlang:resume_process(R);
 4753: 	      _ ->
 4754: 		  ok
 4755: 	  end,
 4756:     receive
 4757: 	      {woke_up, R} ->
 4758: 		  ok
 4759: 	  after 2000 ->
 4760: 		  I = process_info(R, [status, message_queue_len]),
 4761: 		  io:format("~p~n", [I]),
 4762: 		  ct:fail(no_progress)
 4763: 	  end,
 4764:     ok.
 4765: 
 4766: gor(Reds, Stop) ->
 4767:     receive
 4768: 	drop_me ->
 4769: 	    gor(Reds+1, Stop);	    
 4770: 	{From, reds} ->
 4771: 	    From ! {reds, Reds, self()},
 4772: 	    gor(Reds+1, Stop);
 4773: 	{From, Stop} ->
 4774: 	    From ! {stopped, Stop, Reds, self()}
 4775:     after 0 ->
 4776: 	    gor(Reds+1, Stop)
 4777:     end.
 4778: 
 4779: garb_other_running(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 4780:     Stop = make_ref(),
 4781:     {Pid, Mon} = spawn_monitor(fun () -> gor(0, Stop) end),
 4782:     Reds = lists:foldl(fun (N, OldReds) ->
 4783: 			             case N rem 2 of
 4784: 					 0 -> Pid ! drop_me;
 4785: 					 _ -> ok
 4786: 				     end,
 4787: 				     erlang:garbage_collect(Pid),
 4788: 				     receive after 1 -> ok end,
 4789: 				     Pid ! {self(), reds},
 4790: 				     receive
 4791: 					       {reds, NewReds, Pid} ->
 4792: 						   true = (NewReds > OldReds),
 4793: 						   NewReds
 4794: 					   end
 4795: 			     end,
 4796: 			     0,
 4797: 			     lists:seq(1, 10000)),
 4798:     receive after 1 -> ok end,
 4799:     Pid ! {self(), Stop},
 4800:     receive
 4801: 	      {stopped, Stop, StopReds, Pid} ->
 4802: 		  true = (StopReds > Reds)
 4803: 	  end,
 4804:     receive {'DOWN', Mon, process, Pid, normal} -> ok end,
 4805:     ok.
 4806: 
 4807: no_priority_inversion(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 4808:     Prio = process_flag(priority, max),
 4809:     Master = self(),
 4810:     Executing = make_ref(),
 4811:     HTLs = lists:map(fun (Sched) ->
 4812: 			     spawn_opt(fun () ->
 4813:                                                Master ! {self(), Executing},
 4814: 					       tok_loop()
 4815: 				       end,
 4816: 				       [{priority, high},
 4817:                                         {scheduler, Sched},
 4818:                                         monitor,
 4819:                                         link])
 4820: 		     end,
 4821: 		     lists:seq(1, erlang:system_info(schedulers_online))),
 4822:     lists:foreach(fun ({P, _}) -> receive {P,Executing} -> ok end end, HTLs),
 4823:     LTL = spawn_opt(fun () ->
 4824: 			    tok_loop()
 4825: 		    end,
 4826: 		    [{priority, low}, monitor, link]),
 4827:     false = erlang:check_process_code(element(1, LTL), nonexisting_module),
 4828:     true = erlang:garbage_collect(element(1, LTL)),
 4829:     lists:foreach(fun ({P, _}) ->
 4830: 			  unlink(P),
 4831: 			  exit(P, kill)
 4832: 		  end, [LTL | HTLs]),
 4833:     lists:foreach(fun ({P, M}) ->
 4834: 			  receive
 4835: 			      {'DOWN', M, process, P, killed} ->
 4836: 				  ok
 4837: 			  end
 4838: 		  end, [LTL | HTLs]),
 4839:     process_flag(priority, Prio),
 4840:     ok.
 4841: 
 4842: no_priority_inversion2(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 4843:     Prio = process_flag(priority, max),
 4844:     Master = self(),
 4845:     Executing = make_ref(),
 4846:     MTLs = lists:map(fun (Sched) ->
 4847: 			     spawn_opt(fun () ->
 4848:                                                Master ! {self(), Executing},
 4849: 					       tok_loop()
 4850: 				       end,
 4851: 				       [{priority, max},
 4852:                                         {scheduler, Sched},
 4853:                                         monitor, link])
 4854: 		     end,
 4855: 		     lists:seq(1, erlang:system_info(schedulers_online))),
 4856:     lists:foreach(fun ({P, _}) -> receive {P,Executing} -> ok end end, MTLs),
 4857:     {PL, ML} = spawn_opt(fun () ->
 4858: 			       tok_loop()
 4859: 		       end,
 4860: 		       [{priority, low}, monitor, link]),
 4861:     RL = request_test(PL, low),
 4862:     RN = request_test(PL, normal),
 4863:     RH = request_test(PL, high),
 4864:     receive
 4865: 	{system_task_test, _, _} ->
 4866: 	    ct:fail(unexpected_system_task_completed)
 4867:     after 1000 ->
 4868: 	    ok
 4869:     end,
 4870:     RM = request_test(PL, max),
 4871:     receive
 4872: 	{system_task_test, RM, true} ->
 4873: 	    ok
 4874:     end,
 4875:     lists:foreach(fun ({P, _}) ->
 4876: 			  unlink(P),
 4877: 			  exit(P, kill)
 4878: 		  end, MTLs),
 4879:     lists:foreach(fun ({P, M}) ->
 4880: 			  receive
 4881: 			      {'DOWN', M, process, P, killed} ->
 4882: 				  ok
 4883: 			  end
 4884: 		  end, MTLs),
 4885:     receive
 4886: 	{system_task_test, RH, true} ->
 4887: 	    ok
 4888:     end,
 4889:     receive
 4890: 	{system_task_test, RN, true} ->
 4891: 	    ok
 4892:     end,
 4893:     receive
 4894: 	{system_task_test, RL, true} ->
 4895: 	    ok
 4896:     end,
 4897:     unlink(PL),
 4898:     exit(PL, kill),
 4899:     receive
 4900: 	{'DOWN', ML, process, PL, killed} ->
 4901: 	    ok
 4902:     end,
 4903:     process_flag(priority, Prio),
 4904:     ok.
 4905: 
 4906: request_test(Pid, Prio) ->
 4907:     Ref = make_ref(),
 4908:     erts_internal:request_system_task(Pid, Prio, {system_task_test, Ref}),
 4909:     Ref.
 4910: 
 4911: system_task_blast(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 4912:     Me = self(),
 4913:     GCReq = fun () ->
 4914: 		    RL = test_req(Me, 100),
 4915: 		    lists:foreach(fun (R) ->
 4916: 					  receive
 4917: 					      {system_task_test, R, true} ->
 4918: 						  ok
 4919: 					  end
 4920: 				  end, RL),
 4921: 		    exit(it_worked)
 4922: 	    end,
 4923:     HTLs = lists:map(fun (_) -> spawn_monitor(GCReq) end, lists:seq(1, 1000)),
 4924:     lists:foreach(fun ({P, M}) ->
 4925: 			  receive
 4926: 			      {'DOWN', M, process, P, it_worked} ->
 4927: 				  ok
 4928: 			  end
 4929: 		  end, HTLs),
 4930:     ok.
 4931: 
 4932: test_req(_Pid, 0) ->
 4933:     [];
 4934: test_req(Pid, N) ->
 4935:     R0 = request_test(Pid, low),
 4936:     R1 = request_test(Pid, normal),
 4937:     R2 = request_test(Pid, high),
 4938:     R3 = request_test(Pid, max),
 4939:     [R0, R1, R2, R3 | test_req(Pid, N-1)].
 4940: 
 4941: system_task_on_suspended(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 4942:     {P, M} = spawn_monitor(fun () ->
 4943: 				   tok_loop()
 4944: 			   end),
 4945:     true = erlang:suspend_process(P),
 4946:     {status, suspended} = process_info(P, status),
 4947:     true = erlang:garbage_collect(P),
 4948:     {status, suspended} = process_info(P, status),
 4949:     true = erlang:resume_process(P),
 4950:     false = ({status, suspended} == process_info(P, status)),
 4951:     exit(P, kill),
 4952:     receive
 4953: 	{'DOWN', M, process, P, killed} ->
 4954: 	    ok
 4955:     end.
 4956: 
 4957: %% When a system task couldn't be enqueued due to the process being in an
 4958: %% incompatible state, it would linger in the system task list and get executed
 4959: %% anyway the next time the process was scheduled. This would result in a
 4960: %% double-free at best.
 4961: %%
 4962: %% This test continuously purges modules while other processes run dirty code,
 4963: %% which will provoke this error as ERTS_PSTT_CPC can't be enqueued while a
 4964: %% process is running dirty code.
 4965: system_task_failed_enqueue(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 4966:     case erlang:system_info(dirty_cpu_schedulers) of
 4967:         N when N > 0 ->
 4968:             system_task_failed_enqueue_1(Config);
 4969:         _ ->
 4970:             {skipped, "No dirty scheduler support"}
 4971:     end.
 4972: 
 4973: system_task_failed_enqueue_1(Config) ->
 4974:     Priv = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
 4975: 
 4976:     Purgers = [spawn_link(fun() -> purge_loop(Priv, Id) end)
 4977:                || Id <- lists:seq(1, erlang:system_info(schedulers))],
 4978:     Hogs = [spawn_link(fun() -> dirty_loop() end)
 4979:             || _ <- lists:seq(1, erlang:system_info(dirty_cpu_schedulers))],
 4980: 
 4981:     ct:sleep(5000),
 4982: 
 4983:     [begin
 4984:          unlink(Pid),
 4985:          exit(Pid, kill)
 4986:      end || Pid <- (Purgers ++ Hogs)],
 4987: 
 4988:     ok.
 4989: 
 4990: purge_loop(PrivDir, Id) ->
 4991:     Mod = "failed_enq_" ++ integer_to_list(Id),
 4992:     Path = PrivDir ++ "/" ++ Mod,
 4993:     file:write_file(Path ++ ".erl",
 4994:                     "-module('" ++ Mod ++ "').\n" ++
 4995:                         "-export([t/0]).\n" ++
 4996:                         "t() -> ok."),
 4997:     purge_loop_1(Path).
 4998: purge_loop_1(Path) ->
 4999:     {ok, Mod} = compile:file(Path, []),
 5000:     erlang:delete_module(Mod),
 5001:     erts_code_purger:purge(Mod),
 5002:     purge_loop_1(Path).
 5003: 
 5004: dirty_loop() ->
 5005:     ok = erts_debug:dirty_cpu(reschedule, 10000),
 5006:     dirty_loop().
 5007: 
 5008: gc_request_when_gc_disabled(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 5009:     AIS = erts_debug:set_internal_state(available_internal_state, true),
 5010:     gc_request_when_gc_disabled_do(ref),
 5011:     gc_request_when_gc_disabled_do(immed),
 5012:     erts_debug:set_internal_state(available_internal_state, AIS).
 5013: 
 5014: gc_request_when_gc_disabled_do(ReqIdType) ->
 5015:     Master = self(),
 5016:     {P, M} = spawn_opt(fun () ->
 5017: 			       true = erts_debug:set_internal_state(gc_state,
 5018: 								    false),
 5019: 			       Master ! {self(), gc_state, false},
 5020: 			       receive after 1000 -> ok end,
 5021: 			       Master ! {self(), gc_state, true},
 5022: 			       false = erts_debug:set_internal_state(gc_state,
 5023: 								     true),
 5024: 			       receive after 100 -> ok end
 5025: 		       end, [monitor, link]),
 5026:     receive {P, gc_state, false} -> ok end,
 5027:     ReqId = case ReqIdType of
 5028:                 ref -> make_ref();
 5029:                 immed -> immed
 5030:             end,
 5031:     async = garbage_collect(P, [{async, ReqId}]),
 5032:     receive
 5033: 	{garbage_collect, ReqId, Result} ->
 5034: 	    ct:fail({unexpected_gc, Result});
 5035: 	{P, gc_state, true} ->
 5036: 	    ok
 5037:     end,
 5038:     receive {garbage_collect, ReqId, true} -> ok end,
 5039:     receive {'DOWN', M, process, P, _Reason} -> ok end,
 5040:     ok.
 5041: 
 5042: gc_request_blast_when_gc_disabled(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 5043:     Master = self(),
 5044:     AIS = erts_debug:set_internal_state(available_internal_state, true),
 5045:     {P, M} = spawn_opt(fun () ->
 5046: 			       true = erts_debug:set_internal_state(gc_state,
 5047: 								    false),
 5048: 			       Master ! {self(), gc_state, false},
 5049: 			       receive after 1000 -> ok end,
 5050: 			       false = erts_debug:set_internal_state(gc_state,
 5051: 								     true),
 5052: 			       receive after 100 -> ok end
 5053: 		       end, [monitor, link]),
 5054:     receive {P, gc_state, false} -> ok end,
 5055:     PMs = lists:map(fun (N) ->
 5056: 			    Prio = case N rem 4 of
 5057: 				       0 -> max;
 5058: 				       1 -> high;
 5059: 				       2 -> normal;
 5060: 				       3 -> low
 5061: 				   end,
 5062: 			    spawn_opt(fun () ->
 5063: 					      erlang:garbage_collect(P)
 5064: 				      end, [monitor, link, {priority, Prio}])
 5065: 		    end, lists:seq(1, 10000)),
 5066:     lists:foreach(fun ({Proc, Mon}) ->
 5067: 			  receive
 5068: 			      {'DOWN', Mon, process, Proc, normal} ->
 5069: 				  ok
 5070: 			  end
 5071: 		  end,
 5072: 		  PMs),
 5073:     erts_debug:set_internal_state(available_internal_state, AIS),
 5074:     receive {'DOWN', M, process, P, _Reason} -> ok end,
 5075:     ok.
 5076: 
 5077: otp_16436(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 5078:     P = spawn_opt(fun () ->
 5079:                           erts_debug:dirty_io(wait, 1000)
 5080:                   end,
 5081:                   [{priority,high},link]),
 5082:     erlang:check_process_code(P, non_existing),
 5083:     unlink(P),
 5084:     exit(P, kill),
 5085:     ok.
 5086: 
 5087: otp_16642(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 5088:     %%
 5089:     %% Whitebox testing...
 5090:     %%
 5091:     %% Ensure that low prio system tasks are interleaved with
 5092:     %% normal prio system tasks as they should.
 5093:     %%
 5094:     process_flag(priority, high),
 5095:     process_flag(scheduler, 1),
 5096:     Pid = spawn_opt(fun () -> receive after infinity -> ok end end,
 5097:                     [link, {scheduler, 1}]),
 5098:     ReqSTasks = fun (Prio, Start, Stop) ->
 5099:                         lists:foreach(
 5100:                           fun (N) ->
 5101:                                   erts_internal:request_system_task(
 5102:                                     Pid,
 5103:                                     Prio,
 5104:                                     {system_task_test,
 5105:                                      {Prio, N}})
 5106:                           end,
 5107:                           lists:seq(Start, Stop))
 5108:                 end,
 5109:     MkResList = fun (Prio, Start, Stop) ->
 5110:                         lists:map(fun (N) ->
 5111:                                           {system_task_test,
 5112:                                            {Prio, N},
 5113:                                            true}
 5114:                                   end,
 5115:                                   lists:seq(Start, Stop))
 5116:                 end,
 5117: 
 5118:     %%% Test when normal queue clears first...
 5119: 
 5120:     ReqSTasks(low, 0, 1),
 5121:     ReqSTasks(normal, 0, 10),
 5122:     ReqSTasks(low, 2, 4),
 5123:     ReqSTasks(normal, 11, 26),
 5124: 
 5125:     Msgs1 = recv_msgs(32),
 5126:     io:format("Got test 1 messages: ~p~n", [Msgs1]),
 5127: 
 5128:     ExpMsgs1 =
 5129:         MkResList(normal, 0, 7)
 5130:         ++ MkResList(low, 0, 0)
 5131:         ++ MkResList(normal, 8, 15)
 5132:         ++ MkResList(low, 1, 1)
 5133:         ++ MkResList(normal, 16, 23)
 5134:         ++ MkResList(low, 2, 2)
 5135:         ++ MkResList(normal, 24, 26)
 5136:         ++ MkResList(low, 3, 4),
 5137:     
 5138:     case Msgs1 =:= ExpMsgs1 of
 5139:         true ->
 5140:             ok;
 5141:         false ->
 5142:             io:format("Expected test 1 messages ~p~n",
 5143:                       [ExpMsgs1]),
 5144:             ct:fail(unexpected_messages)
 5145:     end,
 5146: 
 5147:     receive Unexp1 -> ct:fail({unexpected_message, Unexp1})
 5148:     after 500 -> ok
 5149:     end,
 5150: 
 5151:     io:format("Test 1 as expected~n", []),
 5152: 
 5153:     %%% Test when low queue clears first...
 5154: 
 5155:     ReqSTasks(low, 0, 1),
 5156:     ReqSTasks(normal, 0, 20),
 5157: 
 5158:     Msgs2 = recv_msgs(23),
 5159:     io:format("Got test 2 messages: ~p~n", [Msgs2]),
 5160: 
 5161:     ExpMsgs2 =
 5162:         MkResList(normal, 0, 7)
 5163:         ++ MkResList(low, 0, 0)
 5164:         ++ MkResList(normal, 8, 15)
 5165:         ++ MkResList(low, 1, 1)
 5166:         ++ MkResList(normal, 16, 20),
 5167:     
 5168:     case Msgs2 =:= ExpMsgs2 of
 5169:         true ->
 5170:             ok;
 5171:         false ->
 5172:             io:format("Expected test 2 messages ~p~n",
 5173:                       [ExpMsgs2]),
 5174:             ct:fail(unexpected_messages)
 5175:     end,
 5176: 
 5177:     receive Unexp2 -> ct:fail({unexpected_message, Unexp2})
 5178:     after 500 -> ok
 5179:     end,
 5180: 
 5181:     io:format("Test 2 as expected~n", []),
 5182: 
 5183:     unlink(Pid),
 5184:     exit(Pid, kill),
 5185:     false = is_process_alive(Pid),
 5186:     ok.
 5187: 
 5188: alias_bif(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 5189:     alias_bif_test(node()),
 5190:     {ok, Peer, Node} = ?CT_PEER(),
 5191:     alias_bif_test(Node),
 5192:     stop_node(Peer, Node),
 5193:     ok.
 5194: 
 5195: alias_bif_test(Node) ->
 5196:     A1 = alias(),
 5197:     {P1, M1} = spawn_monitor(Node,
 5198:                              fun () ->
 5199:                                      A1 ! {A1, 1},
 5200:                                      A1 ! {A1, 2},
 5201:                                      [{A1, continue}] = recv_msgs(1),
 5202:                                      A1 ! {A1, 3},
 5203:                                      A1 ! {A1, 4}
 5204:                              end),
 5205:     [{A1,1},{A1,2}] = recv_msgs(2),
 5206:     unalias(A1),
 5207:     P1 ! {A1, continue},
 5208:     [{'DOWN', M1, _, _, _}] = recv_msgs(1),
 5209: 
 5210:     A2 = alias([explicit_unalias]),
 5211:     {P2, M2} = spawn_monitor(Node,
 5212:                              fun () ->
 5213:                                      A2 ! {A2, 1},
 5214:                                      A2 ! {A2, 2},
 5215:                                      [{A2, continue}] = recv_msgs(1),
 5216:                                      A2 ! {A2, 3},
 5217:                                      A2 ! {A2, 4}
 5218:                              end),
 5219:     [{A2,1},{A2,2}] = recv_msgs(2),
 5220:     unalias(A2),
 5221:     P2 ! {A2, continue},
 5222:     [{'DOWN', M2, _, _, _}] = recv_msgs(1),
 5223:     
 5224:     A3 = alias([reply]),
 5225:     {_P3, M3} = spawn_monitor(Node,
 5226:                               fun () ->
 5227:                                       A3 ! {A3, 1},
 5228:                                       A3 ! {A3, 2},
 5229:                                       A3 ! {A3, 3},
 5230:                                       A3 ! {A3, 4}
 5231:                               end),
 5232:     [{A3,1},{'DOWN', M3, _, _, _}] = recv_msgs(2),
 5233:     ok.
 5234: 
 5235: dist_frag_alias(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 5236:     Tester = self(),
 5237:     {ok, Peer, Node} = ?CT_PEER(),
 5238:     {P,M} = spawn_monitor(Node,
 5239:                           fun () ->
 5240:                                   Alias = alias(),
 5241:                                   Tester ! {alias, Alias},
 5242:                                   receive
 5243:                                       {data, Data} ->
 5244:                                           garbage_collect(),
 5245:                                           Tester ! {received_data, Data}
 5246:                                   end,
 5247:                                   exit(end_of_test)
 5248:                           end),
 5249:     Data = term_to_binary(lists:seq(1, 1000000)),
 5250:     receive
 5251:         {alias, Alias} ->
 5252:             Alias ! {data, Data},
 5253:             receive
 5254:                 {received_data, RecvData} ->
 5255:                     Data = RecvData;
 5256:                 {'DOWN', M, process, P, R2} ->
 5257:                     ct:fail(R2)
 5258:             end;
 5259:         {'DOWN', M, process, P, R1} ->
 5260:             ct:fail(R1)
 5261:     end,
 5262:     receive
 5263:         {'DOWN', M, process, P, R3} ->
 5264:             end_of_test = R3
 5265:     end,
 5266:     peer:stop(Peer),
 5267:     ok.
 5268: 
 5269: dist_frag_unaliased(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 5270:     %% Leak fixed by PR-7915 would have been detected using asan or valgrind
 5271:     %% when running this test...
 5272:     Tester = self(),
 5273:     {ok, Peer, Node} = ?CT_PEER(),
 5274:     {P,M} = spawn_monitor(Node,
 5275:                           fun () ->
 5276:                                   Alias = alias(),
 5277:                                   Tester ! {alias, Alias},
 5278:                                   receive
 5279:                                       {data, Data} ->
 5280:                                           garbage_collect(),
 5281:                                           unalias(Alias),
 5282:                                           Tester ! {received_data, Data},
 5283:                                           receive
 5284:                                               {data, _Data} ->
 5285:                                                   exit(received_data_again);
 5286:                                               end_of_test ->
 5287:                                                   exit(end_of_test)
 5288:                                           end
 5289:                                   end
 5290:                           end),
 5291:     Data = term_to_binary(lists:seq(1, 1000000)),
 5292:     receive
 5293:         {alias, Alias} ->
 5294:             Alias ! {data, Data},
 5295:             receive
 5296:                 {received_data, RecvData} ->
 5297:                     Data = RecvData;
 5298:                 {'DOWN', M, process, P, R2} ->
 5299:                     ct:fail(R2)
 5300:             end,
 5301:             Alias ! {data, Data},
 5302:             P ! end_of_test;
 5303:         {'DOWN', M, process, P, R1} ->
 5304:             ct:fail(R1)
 5305:     end,
 5306:     receive
 5307:         {'DOWN', M, process, P, R3} ->
 5308:             end_of_test = R3
 5309:     end,
 5310:     peer:stop(Peer),
 5311:     ok.
 5312: 
 5313: monitor_alias(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 5314:     monitor_alias_test(node()),
 5315:     {ok, Peer, Node} = ?CT_PEER(),
 5316:     monitor_alias_test(Node),
 5317:     stop_node(Peer, Node),
 5318:     ok.
 5319: 
 5320: monitor_alias_test(Node) ->
 5321:     P1 = spawn(Node,
 5322:                fun () ->
 5323:                        [{alias, A1}] = recv_msgs(1),
 5324:                        A1 ! {A1, 1},
 5325:                        A1 ! {A1, 2},
 5326:                        [{A1, continue}] = recv_msgs(1),
 5327:                        A1 ! {A1, 3},
 5328:                        A1 ! {A1, 4}
 5329:                end),
 5330:     MA1 = monitor(process, P1, [{alias, explicit_unalias}]),
 5331:     P1 ! {alias, MA1},
 5332:     [{MA1,1},{MA1,2}] = recv_msgs(2),
 5333:     unalias(MA1),
 5334:     P1 ! {MA1, continue},
 5335:     [{'DOWN', MA1, _, _, _}] = recv_msgs(1),
 5336: 
 5337:     P2 = spawn(Node,
 5338:                fun () ->
 5339:                        [{alias, A2}] = recv_msgs(1),
 5340:                        A2 ! {A2, 1},
 5341:                        A2 ! {A2, 2},
 5342:                        [{A2, continue}] = recv_msgs(1),
 5343:                        A2 ! {A2, 3},
 5344:                        A2 ! {A2, 4}
 5345:                end),
 5346:     MA2 = monitor(process, P2, [{alias, demonitor}]),
 5347:     P2 ! {alias, MA2},
 5348:     [{MA2,1},{MA2,2}] = recv_msgs(2),
 5349:     demonitor(MA2),
 5350:     M2 = monitor(process, P2),
 5351:     P2 ! {MA2, continue},
 5352:     [{'DOWN', M2, _, _, _}] = recv_msgs(1),
 5353: 
 5354:     P3 = spawn(Node,
 5355:                fun () ->
 5356:                        [{alias, A3}] = recv_msgs(1),
 5357:                        A3 ! {A3, 1},
 5358:                        A3 ! {A3, 2}
 5359:                end),
 5360:     MA3 = monitor(process, P3, [{alias, demonitor}]),
 5361:     P3 ! {alias, MA3},
 5362:     [{MA3,1},{MA3,2},{'DOWN', MA3, _, _, _}] = recv_msgs(3),
 5363:     {_P3_1, M3_1} = spawn_monitor(Node,
 5364:                                   fun () ->
 5365:                                           MA3 ! {MA3, 3},
 5366:                                           MA3 ! {MA3, 4}
 5367:                                   end),
 5368:     [{'DOWN', M3_1, _, _, _}] = recv_msgs(1),
 5369:     
 5370:     P4 = spawn(Node,
 5371:                fun () ->
 5372:                        [{alias, _A4}] = recv_msgs(1)
 5373:                end),
 5374:     MA4 = monitor(process, P4, [{alias, reply_demonitor}]),
 5375:     P4 ! {alias, MA4},
 5376:     [{'DOWN', MA4, _, _, _}] = recv_msgs(1),
 5377:     {_P4_1, M4_1} = spawn_monitor(Node,
 5378:                                   fun () ->
 5379:                                           MA4 ! {MA4, 3},
 5380:                                           MA4 ! {MA4, 4}
 5381:                                   end),
 5382:     [{'DOWN', M4_1, _, _, _}] = recv_msgs(1),
 5383: 
 5384:     P5 = spawn(Node,
 5385:                fun () ->
 5386:                        [{alias, A5}] = recv_msgs(1),
 5387:                        A5 ! {A5, 1},
 5388:                        A5 ! {A5, 2}
 5389:                end),
 5390:     MA5 = monitor(process, P5, [{alias, reply_demonitor}]),
 5391:     M_5 = monitor(process, P5),
 5392:     P5 ! {alias, MA5},
 5393:     [{MA5,1},{'DOWN', M_5, _, _, _}] = recv_msgs(2),
 5394: 
 5395:     ok.
 5396:     
 5397: 
 5398: spawn_monitor_alias(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 5399:     %% Exit signals with immediate exit reasons are sent
 5400:     %% in a different manner than compound exit reasons.
 5401:     spawn_monitor_alias_test(undefined, node(), spawn_opt, normal),
 5402:     spawn_monitor_alias_test(undefined, node(), spawn_opt, make_ref()),
 5403:     spawn_monitor_alias_test(undefined, node(), spawn_request, normal),
 5404:     spawn_monitor_alias_test(undefined, node(), spawn_request, make_ref()),
 5405:     {ok, Peer1, Node1} = ?CT_PEER(),
 5406:     spawn_monitor_alias_test(Peer1, Node1, spawn_opt, normal),
 5407:     {ok, Peer2, Node2} = ?CT_PEER(),
 5408:     spawn_monitor_alias_test(Peer2, Node2, spawn_opt, make_ref()),
 5409:     {ok, Peer3, Node3} = ?CT_PEER(),
 5410:     spawn_monitor_alias_test(Peer3, Node3, spawn_request, normal),
 5411:     {ok, Peer4, Node4} = ?CT_PEER(),
 5412:     spawn_monitor_alias_test(Peer4, Node4, spawn_request, make_ref()),
 5413:     ok.
 5414: 
 5415: spawn_monitor_alias_test(Peer, Node, SpawnType, ExitReason) ->
 5416:     Spawn = case SpawnType of
 5417:                 spawn_opt ->
 5418:                     fun (F, O) ->
 5419:                             try
 5420:                                 spawn_opt(Node, F, O)
 5421:                             catch
 5422:                                 error:Err ->
 5423:                                     error({spawn_opt, Err})
 5424:                             end
 5425:                     end;
 5426:                 spawn_request ->
 5427:                     fun (F, O) ->
 5428:                             try
 5429:                                 ReqId = spawn_request(Node, F, O),
 5430:                                 receive
 5431:                                     {spawn_reply, ReqId, ok, P} ->
 5432:                                         {P, ReqId};
 5433:                                     {spawn_reply, ReqId, error, Error} ->
 5434:                                         error(Error)
 5435:                                 end
 5436:                             catch
 5437:                                 error:Err ->
 5438:                                     error({spawn_request, Err})
 5439:                             end
 5440:                     end
 5441:             end,
 5442: 
 5443:     SpawnError = fun (OptList) ->
 5444:                          try
 5445:                              Spawn(fun () -> ok end, OptList),
 5446:                              error(ignored_error)
 5447:                          catch
 5448:                              error:{SpawnType, badarg} when SpawnType == spawn_opt ->
 5449:                                  ok;
 5450:                              error:{SpawnType, badopt} when SpawnType == spawn_request ->
 5451:                                  ok
 5452:                          end
 5453:                  end,
 5454: 
 5455:     SpawnError([{monitor, {{alias, explicit_unalias}}}]),
 5456:     SpawnError([{monitor, [{alias,alias}]}]),
 5457:     SpawnError([{monitor, [{aliases,explicit_unalias}]}]),
 5458:     SpawnError([{monitors, [{alias,explicit_unalias}]}]),
 5459:     
 5460:     {P1, MA1} = Spawn(fun () ->
 5461:                               [{alias, A1}] = recv_msgs(1),
 5462:                               A1 ! {A1, 1},
 5463:                               A1 ! {A1, 2},
 5464:                               [{A1, continue}] = recv_msgs(1),
 5465:                               A1 ! {A1, 3},
 5466:                               A1 ! {A1, 4},
 5467:                               exit(ExitReason)
 5468:                       end, [{monitor, [{alias,explicit_unalias}]}]),
 5469:     P1 ! {alias, MA1},
 5470:     [{MA1,1},{MA1,2}] = recv_msgs(2),
 5471:     unalias(MA1),
 5472:     P1 ! {MA1, continue},
 5473:     [{'DOWN', MA1, _, _, ExitReason}] = recv_msgs(1),
 5474: 
 5475:     {P2, MA2} = Spawn(fun () ->
 5476:                               [{alias, A2}] = recv_msgs(1),
 5477:                               A2 ! {A2, 1},
 5478:                               A2 ! {A2, 2},
 5479:                               [{A2, continue}] = recv_msgs(1),
 5480:                               A2 ! {A2, 3},
 5481:                               A2 ! {A2, 4},
 5482:                               exit(ExitReason)
 5483:                       end, [{monitor, [{alias, demonitor}]}]),
 5484:     P2 ! {alias, MA2},
 5485:     [{MA2,1},{MA2,2}] = recv_msgs(2),
 5486:     demonitor(MA2),
 5487:     M2 = monitor(process, P2),
 5488:     P2 ! {MA2, continue},
 5489:     [{'DOWN', M2, _, _, ExitReason}] = recv_msgs(1),
 5490: 
 5491:     {P3, MA3} = Spawn(fun () ->
 5492:                               [{alias, A3}] = recv_msgs(1),
 5493:                               A3 ! {A3, 1},
 5494:                               A3 ! {A3, 2},
 5495:                               exit(ExitReason)
 5496:                       end, [{monitor, [{alias, demonitor}]}]),
 5497:     P3 ! {alias, MA3},
 5498:     [{MA3,1},{MA3,2},{'DOWN', MA3, _, _, _}] = recv_msgs(3),
 5499:     {_P3_1, M3_1} = spawn_monitor(Node,
 5500:                                   fun () ->
 5501:                                           MA3 ! {MA3, 3},
 5502:                                           MA3 ! {MA3, 4},
 5503:                                           exit(ExitReason)
 5504:                                   end),
 5505:     [{'DOWN', M3_1, _, _, ExitReason}] = recv_msgs(1),
 5506:     
 5507:     {P4, MA4} = Spawn(fun () ->
 5508:                               [{alias, _A4}] = recv_msgs(1),
 5509:                               exit(ExitReason)
 5510:                       end, [{monitor, [{alias, reply_demonitor}]}]),
 5511:     P4 ! {alias, MA4},
 5512:     [{'DOWN', MA4, _, _, ExitReason}] = recv_msgs(1),
 5513:     {_P4_1, M4_1} = spawn_monitor(Node,
 5514:                                   fun () ->
 5515:                                           MA4 ! {MA4, 3},
 5516:                                           MA4 ! {MA4, 4},
 5517:                                           exit(ExitReason)
 5518:                                   end),
 5519:     [{'DOWN', M4_1, _, _, ExitReason}] = recv_msgs(1),
 5520: 
 5521:     {P5, MA5} = Spawn(fun () ->
 5522:                               [{alias, A5}] = recv_msgs(1),
 5523:                               A5 ! {A5, 1},
 5524:                               A5 ! {A5, 2},
 5525:                               exit(ExitReason)
 5526:                       end, [{monitor, [{alias, reply_demonitor}]}]),
 5527:     M_5 = monitor(process, P5),
 5528:     P5 ! {alias, MA5},
 5529:     [{MA5,1},{'DOWN', M_5, _, _, ExitReason}] = recv_msgs(2),
 5530: 
 5531:     case Node == node() of
 5532:         true ->
 5533:             ok;
 5534:         false ->
 5535:             {P6, MA6} = Spawn(fun () ->
 5536:                                       [{alias, A6}] = recv_msgs(1),
 5537:                                       A6 ! {A6, 1},
 5538:                                       A6 ! {A6, 2},
 5539:                                       receive after infinity -> ok end
 5540:                               end, [{monitor, [{alias, demonitor}]}]),
 5541:             P6 ! {alias, MA6},
 5542:             stop_node(Peer, Node),
 5543:             [{MA6,1},{MA6,2},{'DOWN', MA6, _, _, noconnection}] = recv_msgs(3),
 5544:             {_P6_1, M6_1} = spawn_monitor(fun () ->
 5545:                                                   MA6 ! {MA6, 3},
 5546:                                                   MA6 ! {MA6, 4}
 5547:                                           end),
 5548:             [{'DOWN', M6_1, _, _, _}] = recv_msgs(1),
 5549:     
 5550:             ok
 5551:     end.
 5552: 
 5553: demonitor_aliasmonitor(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 5554:     {ok, Peer, Node} = ?CT_PEER(),
 5555:     Fun = fun () ->
 5556:                   receive
 5557:                       {alias, Alias} ->
 5558:                           Alias ! {alias_reply, Alias, self()}
 5559:                   end
 5560:           end,
 5561:     LPid = spawn(Fun),
 5562:     RPid = spawn(Node, Fun),
 5563:     AliasMonitor = erlang:monitor(process, LPid, [{alias, explicit_unalias}]),
 5564:     erlang:demonitor(AliasMonitor),
 5565:     LPid ! {alias, AliasMonitor},
 5566:     receive {alias_reply, AliasMonitor, LPid} -> ok end,
 5567:     %% Demonitor signal has been received and cleaned up. Cleanup of
 5568:     %% it erroneously removed it from the alias table which caused
 5569:     %% remote use of the alias to stop working...
 5570:     RPid ! {alias, AliasMonitor},
 5571:     receive {alias_reply, AliasMonitor, RPid} -> ok end,
 5572:     exit(LPid, kill),
 5573:     peer:stop(Peer),
 5574:     false = is_process_alive(LPid),
 5575:     ok.
 5576: 
 5577: down_aliasmonitor(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 5578:     {ok, Peer, Node} = ?CT_PEER(),
 5579:     LPid = spawn(fun () -> receive infinty -> ok end end),
 5580:     RPid = spawn(Node,
 5581:                  fun () ->
 5582:                          receive
 5583:                              {alias, Alias} ->
 5584:                                  Alias ! {alias_reply, Alias, self()}
 5585:                          end
 5586:                  end),
 5587:     AliasMonitor = erlang:monitor(process, LPid, [{alias, explicit_unalias}]),
 5588:     exit(LPid, bye),
 5589:     receive {'DOWN', AliasMonitor, process, LPid, bye} -> ok end,
 5590:     %% Down signal has been received and cleaned up. Cleanup of
 5591:     %% it erroneously removed it from the alias table which caused
 5592:     %% remote use of the alias to stop working...
 5593:     RPid ! {alias, AliasMonitor},
 5594:     receive {alias_reply, AliasMonitor, RPid} -> ok end,
 5595:     peer:stop(Peer),
 5596:     ok.
 5597: 
 5598: monitor_tag(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 5599:     %% Exit signals with immediate exit reasons are sent
 5600:     %% in a different manner than compound exit reasons, and
 5601:     %% immediate tags are stored in a different manner than
 5602:     %% compound tags.
 5603:     monitor_tag_test(undefined, node(), spawn_opt, immed, normal),
 5604:     monitor_tag_test(undefined, node(), spawn_opt, make_ref(), normal),
 5605:     monitor_tag_test(undefined, node(), spawn_opt, immed, make_ref()),
 5606:     monitor_tag_test(undefined, node(), spawn_opt, make_ref(), make_ref()),
 5607:     monitor_tag_test(undefined, node(), spawn_request, immed, normal),
 5608:     monitor_tag_test(undefined, node(), spawn_request, make_ref(), normal),
 5609:     monitor_tag_test(undefined, node(), spawn_request, immed, make_ref()),
 5610:     monitor_tag_test(undefined, node(), spawn_request, make_ref(), make_ref()),
 5611:     {ok, Peer1, Node1} = ?CT_PEER(),
 5612:     monitor_tag_test(Peer1, Node1, spawn_opt, immed, normal),
 5613:     {ok, Peer2, Node2} = ?CT_PEER(),
 5614:     monitor_tag_test(Peer2, Node2, spawn_opt, make_ref(), normal),
 5615:     {ok, Peer3, Node3} = ?CT_PEER(),
 5616:     monitor_tag_test(Peer3, Node3, spawn_opt, immed, make_ref()),
 5617:     {ok, Peer4, Node4} = ?CT_PEER(),
 5618:     monitor_tag_test(Peer4, Node4, spawn_opt, make_ref(), make_ref()),
 5619:     {ok, Peer5, Node5} = ?CT_PEER(),
 5620:     monitor_tag_test(Peer5, Node5, spawn_request, immed, normal),
 5621:     {ok, Peer6, Node6} = ?CT_PEER(),
 5622:     monitor_tag_test(Peer6, Node6, spawn_request, make_ref(), normal),
 5623:     {ok, Peer7, Node7} = ?CT_PEER(),
 5624:     monitor_tag_test(Peer7, Node7, spawn_request, immed, make_ref()),
 5625:     {ok, Peer8, Node8} = ?CT_PEER(),
 5626:     monitor_tag_test(Peer8, Node8, spawn_request, make_ref(), make_ref()),
 5627:     ok.
 5628: 
 5629: monitor_tag_test(Peer, Node, SpawnType, Tag, ExitReason) ->
 5630: 
 5631:     P1 = spawn(Node, fun () -> receive go -> ok end, exit(ExitReason) end),
 5632:     M1 = monitor(process, P1, [{tag, Tag}]),
 5633:     P1 ! go,
 5634:     [{Tag, M1, process, P1, ExitReason}] = recv_msgs(1),
 5635: 
 5636:     M1_2 = monitor(process, P1, [{tag, Tag}]),
 5637:     [{Tag, M1_2, process, P1, noproc}] = recv_msgs(1),
 5638: 
 5639:     Spawn = case SpawnType of
 5640:                 spawn_opt ->
 5641:                     fun (F, O) ->
 5642:                             try
 5643:                                 spawn_opt(Node, F, O)
 5644:                             catch
 5645:                                 error:Err ->
 5646:                                     error({spawn_opt, Err})
 5647:                             end
 5648:                     end;
 5649:                 spawn_request ->
 5650:                     fun (F, O) ->
 5651:                             try
 5652:                                 ReqId = spawn_request(Node, F, O),
 5653:                                 receive
 5654:                                     {spawn_reply, ReqId, ok, P} ->
 5655:                                         {P, ReqId};
 5656:                                     {spawn_reply, ReqId, error, Error} ->
 5657:                                         error(Error)
 5658:                                 end
 5659:                             catch
 5660:                                 error:Err ->
 5661:                                     error({spawn_request, Err})
 5662:                             end
 5663:                     end
 5664:             end,
 5665: 
 5666:     {P2, M2} = Spawn(fun () -> exit(ExitReason) end, [{monitor, [{tag, Tag}]}]),
 5667:     [{Tag, M2, process, P2, ExitReason}] = recv_msgs(1),
 5668: 
 5669:     case Node == node() of
 5670:         true ->
 5671:             ok;
 5672:         false ->
 5673:             {P3, M3} = Spawn(fun () -> receive after infinity -> ok end end,
 5674:                              [{monitor, [{tag, Tag}]}]),
 5675:             stop_node(Peer, Node),
 5676:             [{Tag, M3, process, P3, noconnection}] = recv_msgs(1),
 5677: 
 5678:             case SpawnType == spawn_opt of
 5679:                 true ->
 5680:                     {P6, M6} = Spawn(fun () -> receive after infinity -> ok end end,
 5681:                                      [{monitor, [{tag, Tag}]}]),
 5682:                     [{Tag, M6, process, P6, noconnection}] = recv_msgs(1);
 5683:                 false ->
 5684:                     ok
 5685:             end,
 5686:             ok
 5687:     end.
 5688: 
 5689: no_pid_wrap(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 5690:     process_flag(priority, high),
 5691:     SOnln = erlang:system_info(schedulers_online),
 5692:     Pid = spawn(fun () -> ok end),
 5693:     exit(Pid, kill),
 5694:     false = is_process_alive(Pid),
 5695:     ChkSpwndPid = fun () ->
 5696:                           check_spawned_pid(Pid)
 5697:                   end,
 5698:     MPs = maps:from_list(lists:map(fun (_) ->
 5699:                                            {P, M} = spawn_monitor(ChkSpwndPid),
 5700:                                            {M, P}
 5701:                                    end, lists:seq(1, SOnln))),
 5702:     Res = receive
 5703:               {'DOWN', M, process, _, pid_reused} when is_map_key(M, MPs) ->
 5704:                   case erlang:system_info(wordsize) of
 5705:                       8 ->
 5706:                           ct:fail("Process identifier reused"),
 5707:                           error;
 5708:                       4 ->
 5709:                           {comment,
 5710:                            "Process identifer reused, but this is"
 5711:                            ++ "expected since this is a 32-bit system"}
 5712:                   end;
 5713:               {'DOWN', _, _, _, _} = Down ->
 5714:                   ct:fail({unexpected_down, Down}),
 5715:                   error
 5716:           after
 5717:               3*60*1000 ->
 5718:                   ok
 5719:           end,
 5720:     maps:foreach(fun (_, P) ->
 5721:                          exit(P, kill)
 5722:                  end, MPs),
 5723:     maps:foreach(fun (_, P) ->
 5724:                          false = is_process_alive(P)
 5725:                  end, MPs),
 5726:     Res.
 5727: 
 5728: check_spawned_pid(OldPid) ->
 5729:     Pid = spawn(fun () -> ok end),
 5730:     case OldPid == Pid of
 5731:         false ->
 5732:             check_spawned_pid(OldPid);
 5733:         true ->
 5734:             exit(pid_reused)
 5735:     end.
 5736: 
 5737: %% Internal functions
 5738: 
 5739: recv_msgs(N) ->
 5740:     recv_msgs(N, []).
 5741: 
 5742: recv_msgs(0, Msgs) ->
 5743:     lists:reverse(Msgs);
 5744: recv_msgs(N, Msgs) ->
 5745:     receive
 5746:         Msg ->
 5747:             recv_msgs(N-1, [Msg|Msgs])
 5748:     end.
 5749: 
 5750: wait_until(Fun) ->
 5751:     case Fun() of
 5752: 	true -> true;
 5753: 	false -> receive after 10 -> wait_until(Fun) end
 5754:     end.
 5755: 
 5756: tok_loop() ->
 5757:     tok_loop(hej).
 5758: 
 5759: tok_loop(hej) ->
 5760:     tok_loop(hopp);
 5761: tok_loop(hopp) ->
 5762:     tok_loop(hej).
 5763: 
 5764: id(I) -> I.
 5765: 
 5766: stop_node(Peer, Node) ->
 5767:     verify_nc(node()),
 5768:     verify_nc(Node),
 5769:     peer:stop(Peer).
 5770: 
 5771: verify_nc(Node) ->
 5772:     P = self(),
 5773:     Ref = make_ref(),
 5774:     Pid = spawn(Node,
 5775:                 fun() ->
 5776:                         R = erts_test_utils:check_node_dist(fun(E) -> E end),
 5777:                         P ! {Ref, R}
 5778:                 end),
 5779:     MonRef = monitor(process, Pid),
 5780:     receive
 5781:         {Ref, ok} ->
 5782:             demonitor(MonRef,[flush]),
 5783:             ok;
 5784:         {Ref, Error} ->
 5785:             ct:log("~s",[Error]),
 5786:             ct:fail(failed_nc_refc_check);
 5787:         {'DOWN', MonRef, _, _, _} = Down ->
 5788:             ct:log("~p",[Down]),
 5789:             ct:fail(crashed_nc_refc_check)
 5790:     end.
 5791: 
 5792: enable_internal_state() ->
 5793:     case catch erts_debug:get_internal_state(available_internal_state) of
 5794: 	true -> true;
 5795: 	_ -> erts_debug:set_internal_state(available_internal_state, true)
 5796:     end.
 5797: 
 5798: sys_mem_cond_run(OrigReqSizeMB, TestFun) when is_integer(OrigReqSizeMB) ->
 5799:     %% Debug normally needs more memory, so double the requirement
 5800:     Debug = erlang:system_info(debug_compiled),
 5801:     ReqSizeMB = if Debug -> OrigReqSizeMB * 2; true -> OrigReqSizeMB end,
 5802:     case total_memory() of
 5803: 	TotMem when is_integer(TotMem), TotMem >= ReqSizeMB ->
 5804: 	    TestFun();
 5805: 	TotMem when is_integer(TotMem) ->
 5806: 	    {skipped, "Not enough memory ("++integer_to_list(TotMem)++" MB)"};
 5807: 	undefined ->
 5808: 	    {skipped, "Could not retrieve memory information"}
 5809:     end.
 5810: 
 5811: 
 5812: total_memory() ->
 5813:     %% Total memory in MB.
 5814:     try
 5815: 	SMD = memsup:get_system_memory_data(),
 5816:         TM = proplists:get_value(
 5817:                available_memory, SMD,
 5818:                proplists:get_value(
 5819:                  total_memory, SMD,
 5820:                  proplists:get_value(
 5821:                    system_total_memory, SMD))),
 5822:         TM div (1024*1024)
 5823:     catch
