 5824: 	_ : _ ->
 5825: 	    undefined
 5826:     end.
 5827: 
 5828: start_ei_node(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 5829:     DataDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
 5830:     FwdNodeExe = filename:join(DataDir, "fwd_node"),
 5831:     Name = atom_to_list(?MODULE)
 5832:         ++ "-" ++ "ei_node"
 5833:         ++ "-" ++ integer_to_list(erlang:system_time(second))
 5834:         ++ "-" ++ integer_to_list(erlang:unique_integer([positive])),
 5835:     Cookie = atom_to_list(erlang:get_cookie()),
 5836:     HostName = get_hostname(),
 5837:     Node = list_to_atom(Name++"@"++HostName),
 5838:     Creation = integer_to_list(rand:uniform((1 bsl 15) - 4) + 3),
 5839:     Parent = self(),
 5840:     Pid = spawn_link(fun () ->
 5841:                              register(cnode_forward_receiver, self()),
 5842:                              process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 5843:                              Args = ["-sname", Name,
 5844:                                      "-cookie", Cookie,
 5845:                                      "-creation", Creation],
 5846:                              io:format("Starting ei_node: ~p ~p~n",
 5847:                                        [FwdNodeExe, Args]),
 5848:                              Port = erlang:open_port({spawn_executable, FwdNodeExe},
 5849:                                                      [use_stdio, {args, Args}]),
 5850:                              receive
 5851:                                  {Port, {data, "accepting"}} -> ok
 5852:                              end,
 5853:                              ei_node_handler_loop(Node, Parent, Port)
 5854:                      end),
 5855:     put({ei_node_handler, Node}, Pid),
 5856:     case check_ei_node(Node) of
 5857:         ok -> {ok, Node};
 5858:         Error -> Error
 5859:     end.
 5860: 
 5861: check_ei_node(Node) ->
 5862:     Key = {ei_node_handler, Node},
 5863:     case get(Key) of
 5864:         undefined ->
 5865:             {error, no_handler};
 5866:         Pid when is_pid(Pid) ->
 5867:             Pid ! {check_node, self()},
 5868:             receive
 5869:                 {check_node, Pid, Res} ->
 5870:                     Res
 5871:             after 3000 ->
 5872:                     {error, no_handler_response}
 5873:             end
 5874:     end.
 5875: 
 5876: stop_ei_node(Node) ->
 5877:     case check_ei_node(Node) of
 5878:         ok ->
 5879:             Key = {ei_node_handler, Node},
 5880:             case get(Key) of
 5881:                 undefined ->
 5882:                     {error, no_handler};
 5883:                 Pid when is_pid(Pid) ->
 5884:                     Pid ! {stop_node, self()},
 5885:                     receive
 5886:                         {stop_node, Pid} ->
 5887:                             put(Key, undefined),
 5888:                             ok
 5889:                     after 2000 ->
 5890:                             {error, no_handler_response}
 5891:                     end
 5892:             end;
 5893:         Error ->
 5894:             Error
 5895:     end.
 5896: 
 5897: ei_node_handler_loop(Node, Parent, Port) ->
 5898:     receive
 5899:         {'EXIT', Parent, Reason} ->
 5900:             erlang:disconnect_node(Node),
 5901:             (catch port_close(Port)),
 5902:             exit(Reason);
 5903:         {stop_node, Parent} ->
 5904:             erlang:disconnect_node(Node),
 5905:             (catch port_close(Port)),
 5906:             Parent ! {stop_node, self()},
 5907:             exit(normal);
 5908:         {check_node, Parent} ->
 5909:             Ref = make_ref(),
 5910:             {a_name, Node} ! Ref,
 5911:             receive
 5912:                 Ref ->
 5913:                     Parent ! {check_node, self(), ok}
 5914:             after
 5915:                 2000 ->
 5916:                     Parent ! {check_node, self(), {error, no_node_response}}
 5917:             end;
 5918:         Msg ->
 5919:             Msgs = fetch_all_messages([Msg]),
 5920:             erlang:disconnect_node(Node),
 5921:             (catch port_close(Port)),
 5922:             exit({ei_node_handler, Node, unexpected_messages, Msgs})
 5923:     end,
 5924:     ei_node_handler_loop(Node, Parent, Port).
 5925: 
 5926: fetch_all_messages(Msgs) ->
 5927:     receive
 5928:         Msg ->
 5929:             fetch_all_messages([Msg|Msgs])
 5930:     after
 5931:         0 ->
 5932:             Msgs
 5933:     end.
 5934: 
 5935: get_hostname() ->
 5936:     get_hostname(atom_to_list(node())).
 5937: 
 5938: get_hostname([$@ | HostName]) ->
 5939:     HostName;
 5940: get_hostname([_ | Rest]) ->
 5941:     get_hostname(Rest).
 5942: 
 5943: receive_any() ->
 5944:     receive M -> M end.
